amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-74 to establish a program to coordinate with state and local governments to enable minimize the need for transportation of toxic inhalation hazardous materials by rail.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-74 to establish a program to coordinate with state and local governments to enable minimize the need for transportation of toxic inhalation hazardous materials by rail.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 184, 4 Present (Roll no. 199).

action.text: Mr. Price (GA) demanded a separate vote on the Cohen amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 188 (Roll no. 195).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cohen.
